#+STARTUP: fold
* takeokunn's braindump

[[https://deepwiki.com/takeokunn/blog][https://img.shields.io/badge/DeepWiki-takeokunn%2Fblog-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,]]

** Overview

This is a [[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zettelkasten][Zettelkasten]]-style knowledge management system and technical blog.

Notes are written in org-mode and managed with [[https://www.orgroam.com/][org-roam]], enabling bidirectional linking between notes.

The content is then published to multiple platforms through various exporters:

- Main blog via [[https://ox-hugo.scripter.co/][ox-hugo]] + Hugo
- Zenn.dev via [[https://github.com/conao3/ox-zenn][ox-zenn]]
- dev.to via [[https://github.com/larstvei/ox-gfm][ox-gfm]]
- PDF slides/articles via [[https://github.com/jmpunkt/ox-typst][ox-typst]] + Typst

All builds are reproducible using Nix flakes.

** Architecture

#+begin_src
.
├── hugo/      # Main blog (Hugo + ox-hugo + org-roam)
├── zenn/      # Zenn.dev articles (ox-zenn)
├── devto/     # dev.to articles (ox-gfm)
└── typst/     # PDF slides/articles (Typst + ox-typst)
#+end_src

Each subdirectory contains:
- =org/= - Source org-mode files
- =flake.nix= - Build definition
- =scripts/= - Export scripts for Emacs batch mode

** Tech Stack
*** Content Management

- [[https://www.orgroam.com/][org-roam]] - Zettelkasten implementation for Emacs
- org-mode - Plain text markup

*** Hugo Blog

- [[https://gohugo.io/][Hugo]] - Static site generator
- [[https://ox-hugo.scripter.co/][ox-hugo]] - org-mode to Hugo markdown
- [[https://github.com/tani/org-roam-ui-lite][org-roam-ui-lite]] - Interactive graph visualization
- [[https://github.com/Ladicle/tcardgen][tcardgen]] - OGP image generation
- [[https://github.com/takeokunn/hugo-take-theme][hugo-take-theme]] - Custom theme

*** Zenn

- [[https://github.com/conao3/ox-zenn.el][ox-zenn]] - org-mode to Zenn markdown

*** dev.to

- [[https://github.com/larstvei/ox-gfm][ox-gfm]] - org-mode to GitHub Flavored Markdown
- [[https://github.com/calvinmclean/article-sync][article-sync]] - Article synchronization

*** Typst

- [[https://typst.app/][Typst]] - Modern typesetting system
- [[https://github.com/jmpunkt/ox-typst][ox-typst]] - org-mode to Typst
- [[https://github.com/polylux-typ/polylux][polylux]] - Presentation slides for Typst

*** Build & Lint

- [[https://nixos.org/][Nix]] flakes - Reproducible builds
- [[https://devenv.sh/][devenv]] - Development environment
- [[https://textlint.org/][textlint]] - Text linting
- [[https://github.com/secretlint/secretlint][secretlint]] - Secret detection

** Published URLs

| Platform   | URL                             |
|------------+---------------------------------|
| Main Blog  | https://www.takeokunn.org       |
| Graph View | https://www.takeokunn.org/graph |
| Zenn       | https://zenn.dev/takeokunn      |
| dev.to     | https://dev.to/takeokunn        |
| PDF slides | https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf   |

** Build Commands
*** Hugo
#+begin_src console
  $ cd hugo && nix build '.?submodules=1#build-hugo'
#+end_src
*** org-roam-ui-lite
#+begin_src console
  $ cd hugo && nix build .#build-org-roam-ui-lite
#+end_src
*** Zenn
#+begin_src shell
  $ cd zenn && nix build .#build-zenn
#+end_src
*** dev.to
#+begin_src console
  $ cd devto && nix build .#build-devto
#+end_src
*** Typst
#+begin_src console
  $ cd typst && nix build .#example-slide
#+end_src

Available Typst packages:

- =example-slide= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/example-slide.pdf][Example presentation]]
- =example-slide-light-theme= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/example-slide-light-theme.pdf][Light theme variant]]
- =nix-meetup-3-my-nix-usecase= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/nix-meetup-3-my-nix-usecase.pdf][Nix meetup presentation]]
- =phperkaigi-2025-pamphlet= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/phperkaigi-2025-pamphlet.pdf][PHPerKaigi 2025 article]]
- =phperkaigi-2026-pamphlet= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/phperkaigi-2026-pamphlet.pdf][PHPerKaigi 2026 article]]
- =typst-presentation-practice= - [[https://www.takeokunn.org/pdf/typst-presentation-practice.pdf][Presentation practice]]

** Theme

Using [[https://github.com/takeokunn/hugo-take-theme][takeokunn/hugo-take-theme]].

#+begin_src shell :results output none
  $ git submodule update --remote --recursive
#+end_src
